column4:
['Manamaani se haragiz na daro', '
Kabhi shaadi na karo', '
Man maani se haragiz na daro', '
Kabhi shaadi na karo', 'Are marazi hai, aaj kahi baahar khaanaa khaaye', '
Wo kahegi nahi sahab thik aath baje ghar wapas aa jaaye', 'Kitaab liye haath me aap chain se baithe hai', '
Wo kahegi hamase ruthe hai?', 'Kabhi kisi bhi nari se kar lo, do baate', '
Wo kahegi kya inhi se hoti hai chhup ke mulaqaate?', 'Are tauba bewaqufi ki hai shaadi intahaa', '
Are aurat apna soche auro ki nahi parawaah', 'Jo ji main aaye wo karo kabhi shaadi na karo', 'Ji te ji are bhai na maro kabhi shadi nakaro', '
Manamaani se haragiz na daro', '
Kabhi shaadi haa kabhi shaadi na baabaa na.']
